effect.ias_spellbooks.mob_spirit_timer.d: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
effect.ias_spellbooks.ragno_timer.descri: Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
Controls despawn time for summoned entities.
item.ias_spellbooks.book_of_dark_mutatio: Can be obtained by defeating Freakager and Ragno. You can find them as village raid bosses.
Can be obtained by defeating The Magispeller. They spawn in village raids as bosses.
rarity.ias_spellbooks:legendary.name: Legendary
rarity.ias_spellbooks:mythic.name: Mythic
rarity.ias_spellbooks:signature.name: Signature
spell.ias_spellbooks.blazing_imprint.gui: Summons multiple imps in a straight line. These creatures leap upward, dealing damage and igniting any entities they hit. Can only be obtained by defeating Spiritcaller.
spell.ias_spellbooks.dragline.guide: Weave a magical spider web that ensnares targets, gradually pulling them closer to the caster. Can only be obtained by defeating Freakager & Ragno.
spell.ias_spellbooks.handemic.guide: Summons two spirit hands that taunt a target and do all sorts of funny business. Can only be obtained by defeating Spiritcaller.
spell.ias_spellbooks.hellish_horde.guide: Summons several imps around a target. The imps rush toward the target and explode, dealing damage. Can only be obtained by defeating Spiritcaller.
spell.ias_spellbooks.pumpkin_spice.guide: Throws multiple pumpkin bombs in a radius, that tracks down their target and explodes to deal damage. Can only be obtained by defeating Freakager & Ragno.
spell.ias_spellbooks.restorative_rain.gu: Hurls multiple dark healing potions into the air, creating a rain that heals nearby entities. Can only be obtained by defeating Magispeller.
spell.ias_spellbooks.silken_breath.guide: Exhales a stream of ash and webbing, dealing damage and entangling entities in a sticky web. Can only be obtained by defeating Freakager & Ragno.
spell.ias_spellbooks.snack_attack.guide: Summon Trick-or-Treats that circle around the caster before lunging inward, restoring health on impact. Can only be obtained by defeating Freakager & Ragno.
spell.ias_spellbooks.spirits_chosen.guid: Absorbs health from nearby enemies and summons spirits. Each spirit’s health increases based on the amount absorbed, and the number of spirits scales with the number of enemies nearby. Can only be obtained by defeating Spiritcaller.
spell.ias_spellbooks.venomous_reborn.gui: Cast to summon a rideable Ragno, that'll protect and fight for you. However, beware: its will is not fully tameable, and its ferocity may prove unpredictable. Can only be obtained by defeating Freakager & Ragno.
spell.ias_spellbooks.zoom_n_boom.guide: Summons and instantly mounts a Kaboomer that teleports to your target. After a short delay, it explodes in a powerful blast, damaging everything nearby. Can only be obtained by defeating Magispeller.
